segments.text: Look , Dad , many people are doing morning exercises here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I used to come out here with my grandpa as child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? You were so happy then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aren't you happy now ? I hadn't seen the piano when I was a child .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The park is so beautiful . It is a good thing I have taken the camera .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad , I'd like to take a picture with the status .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Give me a big smile . Are you ready ? Cheese !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daddy , we can't have a photo of the whole family . We can take one here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Could you take a photo for us ? Just press this button .
segments.speaker: S2
